description: Config version registry for Prime-RL training runs

v1.notes: Initial 2xH100 config with batch=128, rollouts=8, max_tokens=10000

v2.notes: Speed optimizations: max_tokens 10k->4k, rollouts 8->4, oversampling 2->1, added prefix caching

v3.notes: CRITICAL FIX: executor_backend prime->local (10-15x speedup). Restored rollouts=8, oversampling=2.0. v2 postmortem: system was latency-bound not throughput-bound.

v1.notes: Single H100 config with activation checkpointing
Bootstrap mode for easy tasks before ramping to harder
Vast.ai 4090 config: 72% cost savings ($0.56 vs $1.99/hr). Reduced batch/rollouts/tokens for 24GB VRAM, activation checkpointing enabled.
5090 has 32GB VRAM vs 4090's 24GB - gives headroom for FSDP init. Cost: $0.33-0.40/hr (83% savings vs H100).
